hero.title: Hi, I'm Mehmet
hero.subTitle: I'm a
hero.roles: Full-Stack Developer|Software Engineer|Web Designer|Problem Solver|AI/ML Enthusiast|Tech Addict
hero.description: I'm Mehmet Kucak, a full-stack developer passionate about creating exceptional web experiences. I work with React, Next.js, and Node.js to build applications that are both beautiful and functional. Let's build something great together.

about.title: About Me
about.content1: Hi, I'm Mehmet Kucak. An {age}-year-old from Turkey who's been obsessed with coding since I was 12. It started with me wanting to create games in Scratch, and turned into a journey through game engines programming languages, and web development.
about.content2: Web development was special for me because the idea of creating an interactive app that can be used on any platform by anyone was magical to me. With that idea in mind, I started learning technologies like React, TypeScript, NextJS, NodeJS, and PostgreSQL.
about.content3: While studying for school and university entrance exams, I've had the opportunity to participate in competitions like Teknofest, First Lego League, and various programming challenges and they taught me a lot about problem-solving, time managment, teamwork, and much more.
about.content4: Currently studying for university while continuing to build projects, improve my skills, and learn new ones. Got an interesting project or just want to talk? Don't hesitate to reach out, I'm always up for a good conversation! You can see my contact information below.
